A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Another great addition to the Star Wars universe. While not without some flaws\, I found The Last Jedi to be fun\, interesting\, and thoughtful. The visuals and cinematography are amazing with some terrific shots\, especially in the third act. It was awesome to see Mark Hamill back in the saddle as our favorite hero\, Luke Skywalker\, and to see the rest of the cast work so well with each other.
